header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN COMMITTEE

amendments.proposer: THE LORD BISHOP OF RIPON AND LEEDS

text.quote: 000: The Schedule, page 4, line 9, leave out “150(1)(i) and (j)” and insert “150(1)(j)”
000: The Schedule, page 4, line 26, leave out sub-paragraph (k)
000: The Schedule, page 4, line 41, leave out sub-paragraph (b)
